Yahtzy is a strategy game to play with 5 dice. You play alone and your purpose is to get the highest score you can.
There are 13 rounds during which you need to roll your dice and sign the score in one of the available combination box u want to sign (except the bonus box). You must sign one combination box in each round, also you can roll your dice a maximum of three times per round and you can choose which dice to keep.

Combinations

Left Column

One: Sum of dice with number 1.
Two: Sum of dice with number 2.
Three: Sum of dice with number 3.
Four: Sum of dice with number 4.
Five: Sum of dice with number 5.
Six: Sum of dice with number 6.

Right Column

Three of a kind: At least three dice the same, score is the sum of all dice.
Four of a kind: At least four dice the same, score is the sum of all dice.
Small straight: (30 pts) Four sequential dice.
Large straight: (40 pts) Five sequential dice.
Full house: (25 pts) Three of one number and two of another.
Yahtzy: (50 pts) All five dice the same.
Chance: Sum of all dice.

Rules

Bonus: If you score a total number of 63 or more in the left column, then you get a +35 bonus score.
Yahtzee bonus: If you already signed the Yahtzy combination box with a 50 and you score another Yahtzy, you get +100 extra points. If the Yahtzee box was signed with 0, you get no extra points. In either case you choose another combination box to sign depending on the joker rule.
Joker: If you score a Yahtzy but the respective combination box was already signed, then if the left column section corresponding to the Yahtzee dice faces was already signed, you can sign one of the available combination box between Full house, Small straight and Large straight even if dice does not correspond or another available combination box.
